abstract: AT&T will offer prepaid customers the ability to pay $3 to make unlimited local and long-distance calls for one day.
snippet: AT&T will offer prepaid customers the ability to pay $3 to make unlimited local and long-distance calls for one day.
lead_paragraph: Some phone users can’t commit to monthly plans. Instead these so-called prepaid users pay for buckets of minutes — effectively paying as they go.

headline.main: AT&T Has a Prepaid Twist: Talk All Day for $3
